snippet: Unofficial equipment for Olympic athletes has arrived in a way previously reserved for official sponsors.
abstract: Many Olympic swimmers listen to music through headphones on their way to the starting blocks in pursuit of perfect prerace concentration; headphones on display at the Olympic aquatics center have so far evaded the brand police, surely to the delight of the companies that did not have to pay for their logos to be seen by millions of viewers around the world.

byline.original: By ANDREW DAS and ANDREW MARTIN

lead_paragraph: Unofficial equipment for Olympic athletes has arrived in a way previously reserved for official sponsors.

headline.seo: Headphone Brands Compete for Viewers’ Attention at Olympics
